title: Tommy Boy Presents HipHop Essentials 1979-1991
description:
Year Of Release: 2005-2006
Label: Tommy Boy
Genre: Hip Hop, Rap, Miscellaneous

This is a huge 12 disc box set of various old school rap songs from the years 1979-1991. Something you do not want to miss!


From the biggest radio hits to the underground club favorites, the early days of hip-hop featured some of the best music ever recorded. Now Tommy Boy has compiled its critically acclaimed "Essential Hip Hop" series, Volumes 1-12, into one limited edition box set. Compiled by Tommy Boy founder Tom Silverman himself, the "Hip-Hop Essentials" series includes classic, groundbreaking records from the years 1979-1991. A great assortment of hip-hop - 144 songs = 12 hours 07 min 15 sec.
